name: OCLC DevNet
description: OCLC is a worldwide library cooperative, providing services and research to improve access to the world’s information. The OCLC Developer Network is a community of developers collaborating in a sandbox environment in order to propose, discuss and test OCLC Web Services. This open source, code-sharing infrastructure improves the value of OCLC data for all users by encouraging new OCLC Web Service uses.
